name: The Virtual Trillium Trail v.2.0 (Online & Cross-platform)
blurb: Imagine a computer game where you experience awe and wonder, curiosity, and a desire to explore, discover, and learn.

rewards.reward: ~ Rain\u2019s Drops ~ Every Rain Drop is important and very much needed!!!! Receive a FREE Virtual Field Trips Web Account, participation in the community, and a big THANK YOU email from the founders and creative team. Your name listed on the web site.

~ Wind\u2019s Breath ~ Receive all of the above and an additional ONE FREE HOUR of Web, browser based, on-line game play of The Virtual Trillium Trail v.2.0 powered by Gaikai, or a digital PC download good for one hour of play.

~ Friends of the Sycamore ~ As a friend of the tree of curiosity, you will receive the gift of intrinsic inquiry. Be a part of making a really cool and valuable game available online. Provide the capital that no one else would and enable it to be produced without compromise. Receive all of the above and an additional, non-expiring, PC digital download, a $45.95 value!

~ Friends of the Hawk ~ Receive all of the above and an additional, non-expiring, physical CD copy for the PC, a $55.95 value! Your name listed on the web site associated with The Friends of the Hawk. This funding level is actually VERY IMPORTANT. We only need about 2,000 of you to help at this level to be successful! Given the past funding of Kickstarter projects, this is totally possible! If you pledge at this level and we are successful, we will be part of a Creator/Consumer/Capitalist Revolution!
~ Friends of the Fawn ~ Receive all of the above and a limited edition, signed copy of the physical CD for the PC. Your name listed on the web site associated with The Friends of the Fawn.

~ Friends of the Trillium ~ Receive all of the above and an additional signed, limited edition, work of art of the Trillium, from the series of artworks produced by Maria C. R. Harrington http://www.mariacrharrington.com/ (8\u00bd\u201d x 11\u201d inches, unframed). Your name listed on the web site associated with The Friends of the Trillium.

~ Watersheds ~ Receive all of the above and an additional signed, limited edition, work of art, of the Watersheds, from the series of artworks produced by Maria C. R. Harrington (8\u00bd\u201d x 11\u201d inches, unframed). Your name listed on the web site associated with the Watersheds.

~ Future Wild Things ~ You may suggest a Wild Thing Avatar to add to a future release and name it! Receive all of the above and additional privileges. You may have your name listed on the web site as Adviser to the Artistic Director.\r\n\r\n****** Disclaimer, see full description below.******* Your name will appear on the web site associated with your Wild Thing Avatar, by September 20, 2012, and your Wild Thing Avatar, when it is ready, sometime in 2013.

~ Stewards of the Land ~ It is our honor and privilege to offer to print your name, or on behalf of any corporation or organization of your choice and authority, to be associated with The Stewards of the Land and Adviser to the Production Manager, on The Virtual Trillium Trail web site and in the game credits. You have the right to remain anonymous. Receive all of the above and receive an additional gift; your choice of an original work of art, from The Virtual Trillium Trail virtual environment, signed by Maria C. R. Harrington (21\u201d x 35\u201d inches, unframed). You will also have access to the Beta test of The Virtual Trillium Trail\u2122 v.2.0.

~ Guardians of the Forest ~ It is our honor and privilege to offer to print your name or on behalf of any corporation or organization, associated with The Guardians of the Forest Sponsors, on The Virtual Trillium Trail web site with an optional photograph or a logo. You have the right to remain anonymous. You may be listed on the web site as Adviser to the Executive Director of The Virtual Trillium Trail v.2.0, as well. Receive all of the above and receive an additional gift of one of the very LAST of the originally designed Virtual Trillium Trail Ranger Embroidered Badges. Additionally, you will be able to advise the executive producer and participate in the Alpha release of The Virtual Trillium Trail v.2.0.

The Forces of Nature level is the most powerful and elite level. You know who you are. You have a true heart, open mind, and pure soul. It is our honor and privilege to offer to print your name, or on behalf of any corporation or organization or your choice and authority, to be associated with Forces of Nature Sponsors, on the Virtual Field Trips, LLC., company\u2019s web site with an optional photograph or a logo. Your name listed on web site as Honorary Consul Virtual Field Trips. You have the right to remain anonymous. Receive all of the above and receive an additional gift of one of the FIRST Virtual Field Trips, LLC., embroidered badges.
